comments.body:
@eatkins Thank you for the review & suggestion. The PR got better as a result.

I implemented the shorter timeout and a common, central routine.

 I kept the new routine within the ProcessSuite object, rather than your suggested ProcessOs, 
because I think the block or suspend is more closely logically related to the test being
suspended rather than the underlying process.

Please let me know, if possible, if this adequately resolves your concern.  Thank you.
@eatkins Thank you, again, for the timely rview.
